languages.text: {n}Арлекин глубоко кланяется, словно актер удачно завершивший представление перед ценителем высокого искусства. Кажется, он удовлетворен вашим ответом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Арлекин глубоко кланяется, словно актер удачно завершивший представление перед ценителем высокого искусства. Кажется, он удовлетворен вашим ответом.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text: {n}The Harlequin sweeps into a low bow, like an actor who has performed before a true lover of high art. He seems satisfied with your answer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Арлекин глубоко кланяется, словно актер удачно завершивший представление перед ценителем высокого искусства. Кажется, он удовлетворен вашим ответом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Harlequin sweeps into a low bow, like an actor who has performed before a true lover of high art. He seems satisfied with your answer.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text: {n}丑角低下头，向你鞠了一躬，如同在真正的高雅艺术的爱好者面前表演的演员一般。他似乎对你的回答非常满意。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin sweeps into a low bow, like an actor who has performed before a true lover of high art. He seems satisfied with your answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}丑角低下头，向你鞠了一躬，如同在真正的高雅艺术的爱好者面前表演的演员一般。他似乎对你的回答非常满意。{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text: {n}El Arlequín hace una profunda reverencia, como un actor que acaba de completar una función frente a un verdadero entusiasta de las artes. Parece satisfecho con tu respuesta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin sweeps into a low bow, like an actor who has performed before a true lover of high art. He seems satisfied with your answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El Arlequín hace una profunda reverencia, como un actor que acaba de completar una función frente a un verdadero entusiasta de las artes. Parece satisfecho con tu respuesta.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text: {n}ハーレクィンは芸術を心から愛する者の前で演じた俳優のように、低く頭を下げて礼をした。こちらの答えに満足しているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin sweeps into a low bow, like an actor who has performed before a true lover of high art. He seems satisfied with your answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハーレクィンは芸術を心から愛する者の前で演じた俳優のように、低く頭を下げて礼をした。こちらの答えに満足しているようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text: {n}Der Harlekin verneigt sich tief, wie ein Schauspieler, der vor einem wahren Liebhaber der hohen Kunst aufgetreten ist. Deine Antwort scheint ihn zufriedenzustellen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin sweeps into a low bow, like an actor who has performed before a true lover of high art. He seems satisfied with your answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Harlekin verneigt sich tief, wie ein Schauspieler, der vor einem wahren Liebhaber der hohen Kunst aufgetreten ist. Deine Antwort scheint ihn zufriedenzustellen.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text: {n}L'Arlequin s'incline, comme un acteur qui vient d'achever sa représentation devant {mf|un|une} véritable {mf|amateur|amatrice} d'art. Votre réponse semble lui convenir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin sweeps into a low bow, like an actor who has performed before a true lover of high art. He seems satisfied with your answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'arlequin s'incline, comme un acteur qui vient d'achever sa représentation devant {mf|un|une} véritable {mf|amateur|amatrice} d'art. Votre réponse semble lui convenir.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni

languages.text: {n}Arleken, gerçek bir yüksek sanat hayranı önünde performansını sergileyen bir aktör misali hafifçe eğiliyor. Cevabından memnun olmuşa benziyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin sweeps into a low bow, like an actor who has performed before a true lover of high art. He seems satisfied with your answer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Arleken, yüksek sanatların gerçek bir hayranı önünde performansını sergileyen bir aktör misali hafifçe eğiliyor. Cevabından memnun olmuş gibi görünüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Zanni
